lines.content: * Represents main class for Duet chatbot application.
* Duet is a chatbot to help users manage a list of tasks to perform.
* Users can add, mark, unmark, list, delete tasks.
* Runs Duet Chatbot so that users can add, remove or mark tasks as done.
* Represents an exception specifically for Duet chatbot.
* This exception handles errors that occur when a user gives an invalid command.
* Creates a new DukeException with a particular error description.
* @param description The error description for cause of error.
* Returns a string representation of cause of error.
* @return A string consists of error message.
* Represents an exception that is thrown when no input is provided.
* Creates an EmptyInputException with error message.
* Returns the error message when no input is provided.
* @return A string consists of the specific error message.
* Represents an exception that is thrown when an invalid input is provided
* Creates an InvalidInputException with error message.
* Returns the error message when no input is provided.
* @return A string consists of the specific error message.
* Represents a class that deals with user commands.
* It parses user commands and updates the TaskList.
* Reads user input and perform the corresponding action
* like adding, removing or marking tasks as done.
* @param ui Ui to read user input.
* @param storage Storage to load and save data.

* Represents a class that deals with loading
* and saving tasks from a file.
* Saves every single task inside duet.txt file.
* Returns ArrayList of Task in the previous interaction with Duet chatbot.
* Encapsulates a deadline added by user through Duet chatbot.
* Return the string representation of a deadline.
* @return A string consists of deadline description.
* Encapsulates an event added by user through Duet chatbot.

* It has add/delete tasks in the list.
